ygData.subject: Re: Gnoll hide lariat (was My Yk!!!)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No.  My current arsenal is: Crystalline Blade Enamelled Black Mace The mace is 8/28, and although it s bulbous head is wearing on me, it s certainly
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 5 Jan 2000, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:

> runed bone fork in the ranged slot. Opinions: does the stun effect and
> extra AC offset the lower damage rating?

No. My current arsenal is:
Crystalline Blade
Enamelled Black Mace

The mace is 8/28, and although it's bulbous head is wearing on me, it's
certainly prettier than the ugly stick. The blade is 11/38, and compared
to the Runed Falchion (11/34, 4kpp and the thick offbalanced look of a
scimitar) is plenty for my job.

I recently finished maxing most melee skills (slashing with the whips,
piercing with Mithril Quill/Dirk, blunt with EB Mace and FS Hammer
(5/30)), but defense eludes me. I'm still 6 points short of the 200 cap,
meaning a lot of ac is waiting to be had. I tried loading up on int gear
and getting myself beat up by guards (a newbie asked me what I was doing,
I told him I was masochistic -.-) to no avail. For a while I even used
the Lariats exclusively to attract attention to get hit more, but that
didn't pay off either.

Athren
